scripts.podman:build:
yarn run run-script-if --bool $([ $(command -v podman) ] && echo true || echo false) --then "podman build --ulimit nofile=5000:5000 $(echo $(build-env serverlessWorkflow.baseImage.buildTags) | xargs printf -- "-t $(build-env serverlessWorkflow.baseImage.registry)/$(build-env serverlessWorkflow.baseImage.account)/$(build-env serverlessWorkflow.baseImage.name):%s
" | xargs echo) -f Containerfile" --else "echo Podman not found, skipping image build."
scripts.build:prod: yarn cleanup && yarn copy:assets && yarn install:mvnw && run-script-os
